item.description:
Join us for a gala event for the Boston GLOW Foundation. Founded in 2010, the all volunteer run GLOW Foundation supports programs for women of all ages to become empowered community leaders and active world citizens.

Through two specific program areas - Girls’ Leadership and Organized Women  - GLOW strives to provide pragmatic programming, leadership training, and service-learning opportunities. This gala is their largest fundraiser- last year raising $35,000 for their programs.

 

This delightful event features cocktails, appetizers, live music, dancing, silent auction, special guest speaker Boston City Council member, Ayanna Pressley

Tix are $75 and include 3 drink tickets.

http://www.bostonglow.org/ignite_the_nite_2013_calendar2

Looking forward to seeing you for a fun night helping a great cause!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly inside the event entrance. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Ignite the Nite Gala for the Boston GLOW Foundation
